___timePeriod.description: The earliest or only date for which the attribute values are current. In cases when a range of dates are provided, this is the earliest date for which the information is valid.

___endDateTime.description: Ending date, or date and time.

___endGeologicAge.description: A name, code, or date for the end of an event or period in geologic time.

___startGeologicAge.description: A name, code, or date for the beginning of an event or period in geologic time.

$eref.description: A span of time represented by a starting date-time and an ending date-time.

___periodName.description: Names associated with the time period.

___mustBeUnique.description: Indicates whether the attribute value is required to be unique.

___minValue.description: The minimum range value permissible for this attribute
